    • Method Detail

      • encode

        public void encode(byte[] pixels,
          int start,
          int len)
            throws java.lang.Exception
        This method assumes "len" is a multiplication of scan line length.
        Specified by:
        encode in interface ImageEncoder
        Overrides:
        encode in class G31DEncoder
        Parameters:
        len - the number of pixels to be encoded
        pixels - array of pixels (This has nothing to do with the actual bits per pixel since it could be pixel packed)
        start - offset in the pixel array where the encoding starts (the actual position could be anywhere inside the offset byte which maybe kept track of by the implementation class through a parameter such as currPos if the encoder is pixel oriented).
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • encode2DLine

        protected int encode2DLine(byte[] pixels,
               int start)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
